What 'is' a Built Application?

Applications are essentially a zip file stored with a time stamp

The zip file is formatted as a PhoneGap application

  • All HTML, JS and CSS are contained in the WWW directory
  • package.json - Manifest file used by Content Sync. Content paths and last modified date reside in this file.
  • The zip file can be downloaded and built with PhoneGap (Initial builds of applications must do this)
  • The zip file is also used for OTA updates
